trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property of a column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>gebeurtenis treedt op wanneer de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>eigenschap van een kolom in een <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>besturingselement verandert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over het verwerken van gebeurtenissen [KROONTJESPEN: gebeurtenissen verbruikt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The column with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
The previous <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value of the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: De vorige <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> waarde van de kolom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald van de kolom met de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>eigenschap die gewijzigd.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property that changed.
Gets the previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of the column.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de vorige waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>eigenschap van de kolom.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value representing the previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column*>.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> waarde voor de vorige waarde van de <> </> *> eigenschap van de <> </> *>.
